required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Protein, Amino Acids & Insulin & Glucagon Secretion in Humans
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Ingestion of Foods on the Plasma Glucose and Insulin Response in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes: Protein, Amino Acids & Insulin & Glucagon Secretion in Humans

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of various foods and/or food substances such as fats or proteins on the blood glucose and insulin concentrations in people with and without type 2 diabetes.

detailed_description.textblock: Various foods or food substances are given as a test meal. The metabolic response is determined at various times after the administration of the meal (e.g. blood glucose, and other hormones and metabolites).

primary_outcome.time_frame: several time points after ingestion of test substance
primary_outcome.description: Test substances will be given at 0800 hr and blood drawn at several time points up to 5 hours after the meal.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Several time points after ingestion of test substance
secondary_outcome.description: Test substances will be given at 0800 hr and blood drawn at several time points up to 5 hours after the meal.

arm_group.description: 1 mmol amino acid/kg lean body mass
50 g glucose plus 1 mmol amino acid/kg lean body mass

intervention.intervention_name: water, glucose with or without amino acid
intervention.description: 240 ml water, 50 g glucose Â± 1 mmol amino acid/kg lean body mass

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with or without type 2 diabetes
- C-Peptide > 1.5 ng/ml
- Able to come to the Minneapolis VA Medical Center on several occasions over 2-4 weeks
Exclusion Criteria:
- Body mass index > 40
- hematologic abnormalities
- liver disease
- kidney disease
- congestive heart failure
- life threatening malignancies

Iverson JF, Gannon MC, Nuttall FQ. Interaction of ingested leucine with glycine on insulin and glucose concentrations. J Amino Acids. 2014;2014:521941. doi: 10.1155/2014/521941. Epub 2014 Jul 10.
